name: Evon | Back Bay Convention CTR | Beautiful 1BR S1
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Boston BackBay very close to Copley square.
It is walking distance form the green line and the orange line, NewBurry st, Prudential Center, Boston Common park, Northeastern, Copley Sq, Fenway Park, Boston Medical and tons of other places.
description:

Walk to train.
Next to Convention CTR.
Walk to Prudential CTR, Copley sq, Newbury St, Boston Commons, Kenmore & Fenway, BU, NEU, Berklee & BMC.
